titles.title: Beloved, We're The Sons Of God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Beloved, we're the sons of God.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
We're on the path that Jesus trod.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
Chorus:
Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah.
Hallelujah, hallelujah, hallelujah.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We're wearing armor from above.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
His banner over us is love.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The gates of hell shall not prevail.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
God's sons will march right through the veil.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The steps are seven, the feasts are three.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
To reach that place prepared for me.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
At God's right hand my place shall be.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
But first we'll set creation free.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
The lam shall walk, the blind shall see.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
The dumb shall shout, He died for me!
Hallelujah, hallelujah.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
All sin and death shall pass away.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
We'll live in God's eternal day.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
All praises be to God on high.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
Praise be the Son the heavens reply.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
